segments.text: What kind of personality do you think you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am very active and energetic . I approach things enthusiastically and I don't like leaving them half done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you are introverted or extroverted ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am quite outgoing , I think . I enjoy mixing and doing things with other people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think is the most important thing for you to be happy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I maintain that the most important thing is having good friends . A person can't live all by himself . A friend in need is a friend indeed . So the more really close friends I have , the happier I am .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any friend you would call really close ones ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would call three of my former classmates really close friends . We often get together and talk with each other . Whenever I counter difficulties , they are always ready to give me a hand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of people would you like to work with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: People who are honest , dedicated to their work and have integrity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of people you find hard to work with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Slacker and those who violate working principles .
segments.speaker: S2
